headline: 'Mo Brooks is disappointing': Trump mulls pulling Alabama Senate endorsement
author: David M. Drucker
sentences: The congressman spoke at Trump's Stop the Steal? rally in Washington, D.C., on Jan. 6, 2021, where he said, regarding the vote that day to certify President Joe Biden's Electoral College victory: Today is the day American patriots start taking down names and kicking ass.? And just in case there was any misunderstanding about where Brooks stood after the August 2021 Alabama rally, he sought to clarify his views on Twitter.
